name: SNCF Voyages
overview:
As the European leader in high speed and long distance rail services, SNCF Voyages operates the following brands: TGV, TÃ©oz, iDTGV, Eurostar, Thalys, TGV Lyria, Elipsos, Artesia. In order to offer its clients a complete Â« point to point Â» service, SNCF Voyages manages sales, distribution and service on board, as well as several subsidiaries such as voyages-sncf.com.

SNCF Voyages operates 475 trains, transports 130 million passengers per year and generates annual sales of more than 7 billion euros, 20% of which in international markets.
